measured_by: 3-point Likert-scale survey item on importance of “natural” therapies
justification: The article notes that "Four of these [survey questions] consisted of 3-point Likert scales and inquired about how important 'natural'... therapies were for the patient."

measured_by: 3-point Likert-scale survey item on importance of “holistic” therapies
justification: The same set of Likert items asked participants "how important 'holistic' therapies were for the patient," indicating this construct was assessed with a 3-point Likert scale.

measured_by: 3-point Likert-scale survey item on importance of therapy being evidence-based
justification: The survey "inquired about ... how important it was for their chosen therapy to be 'evidence-based'," again using a 3-point Likert scale.

measured_by: 3-point Likert-scale survey item on effort to avoid all pharmaceuticals
justification: A Likert item asked whether participants "make a conscious effort to avoid all pharmaceuticals," specifying this behavior was measured with a 3-point scale.
